title: Mac loading problems/Black Screen
body: Alrighty, I am having some troubles on league. The problem is that I cannot get on the loading screen or in game (basically I can't load to get ingame). I have tried refreshing my laptop, logging off and on and etc.. I have tried playing on my smurfs account thinking maybe its just my account however its not, I cannot get on the loading screen and when its supposed to be the loading screen instead its a black screen which I cannot ult-tab from. I asked a friend to play for me and he said he can get on the loading screen easily but I can't, hearing from him, now I don't know whether its league or its my laptop. If you had this problem and solved it please help.

replies.body: After a long while, i have found the solution. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jewr24hXCgo
